content: this text is about a legal document called 3l first leaf right writings involving two parties referred to as master h and master j they are both notaries working for different private limited companies the document is being executed through a videoconference and is dated in the year xi of the notarys office mr mg and mrs lk who were previously married have obtained a divorce through mutual consent as part of the settlement they have agreed to relinquish their rights to a property and repay a loan taken out for that property mr mg will be responsible for the loan repayment mrs lk will remain liable to the creditor unless she obtains written confirmation of her release they have received an offer for a new home loan but mrs lk has waived her right to apply for it the offer is subject to certain conditions including the finalization of the divorce and the execution of a divorce mutual consent deed the property provided as collateral for the loan must be insured the offer will expire if the required supporting documents are not provided by a specified date the couple has agreed to divide their assets with mr mg being allocated full ownership of a specific property a sum of €250000 has been arranged for the imposition and discharge of their respective rights in the property the value of the property for tax purposes is estimated at €600000 and the couple has requested a reduced tax rate the parties have chosen their respective residences and confirmed their civil status one of the parties is in a vulnerable position and requires assistance from an administrator legal counsel or trustee this party has also applied for bankruptcy and requested a judicial composition under the collective debt settlement act the draft of the case has been read and acknowledged by the parties involved they believe that the communication was timely and sufficient the entire deed was explained by a notary for the benefit of all parties involved the document was prepared and signed by a notary public
